definition: to tinker with/to incite
drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell
old variant of 鼓[gu3]
pound/beat/hull/attack/disturb/stir

sentences.english: She makes a good lunch (out) of bits and pieces.
sentences.chinese: 用下脚碎料她都能鼓捣出美美的一顿午饭。

sentences.english: My uncle has golden fingers; he can make a palace out of a cardboard.
sentences.chinese: 我舅舅的手很巧，一个硬纸盒能鼓捣成一座宫殿。
